channel.title: Drive Train on Open Rail and Transport Landscape
channel.description: Recent content in Drive Train on Open Rail and Transport Landscape

item.title: Driver Advisory System
item.description: Driver Advisory System is an innovative tool designed to assist train drivers in the delivery of efficient and punctual train services. By integrating a wide range of data sources, including live positioning, infrastructure characteristics, and real-time transport plans, the system calculates and presents the ideal driving profile for each journey.
